alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...High based showers and very isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero, southwestern Kiowa, eastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking high based showers and isolated thunderstorms 9 miles north of Cheraw, or 18 miles north of La Junta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Local gusts to 60 mph will be possible near storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Las Animas, Ordway, Swink, Sugar City, Cheraw, Haswell, Higbee, Blue Lake, Timpas, Arlington and John Martin Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
